messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2212
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/8/2002 8:29:47 AM Central Daylight Time, ... I am sending my thanks as well...... I didn t know much about the jewish faith and had issues
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/8/2002 8:29:47 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> This is one of the most pragmatic, logical and clear explanations I have
> ever heard to the questions of Jesus. Thank you. I will pass this on to at
> least 20 people who have asked these questions, or to Jews who would not be
> able to respond to these questions.

I am sending my thanks as well......

I didn't know much about the jewish faith and had issues from what I had
heard, but I always say you gotta find out the truth for yourself instead of
believing what you are told.
That is once of the things that I try to get my children to see.....You into
the beliefs and don't take others word for it..... We have a book called
Handbook of Denominations of the united states...the library was having a
book sale and we picked it up. It is very informative.

Kim


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

come up with either.....

Kim
